title: Export program & accounts settings

Hi, Is there any way to export only settings from Mozilla and all accounts settings like connections, signatures, etc.? Without messages!

Many thanks.

title: Thunderbird no abre .PDF
content:
Hola, llevamos un tiempo en mi empresa en las que unos de nuestros pc ya no abre los pdf. Solo es un caso en concreto el resto de PCs funcionan bien. Tenemos puesto que en pdf siempre pregunte antes de abrir. Si intento abrir el documento no pasa nada y si guardo y lo abro sala la imagen que adjunto abajo pero desde otro pc si me deja descargarlo y guardarlo y funciona bien.


Alguna idea de lo que puede ser?

title: TRYCREATE the destination mailbox could not be found
content:
Buongiorno. Ho configurato la mail istituzionale dell'Università di Bologna su Thunderbird. Nessun problema per la posta in arrivo mentre: 1. non riesco a vedere la posta inviata (sebbene le mail vengano inviate), sembra non ci sia il collegamento in temo reale e le mail non vengono visualizzate; 2. come da oggetto, nel momento in cui cancello un messaggio ricevo questo alert e i messaggi non vengono spostati sul cestino: "TRYCREATE the destination mailbox could not be found". Nota aggiuntiva. Configurazione IAMP/SMTP eseguita correttametne Come risolvere? Mille grazie.

Mozilla Thunderbird: 78.1.1 (32 bit) SO: Win10 x64 Account IMAP
creator: federico.tabarrini

title: Buttons in messages can no longer be changed
content: TB120 A number of versions back the various buttons in the top right of message header (Reply, Forward, Archive, Junk, Delete, etc.) could be reordered in the customise menu. This allowed the placing of the most often used in a position that suited and less often required ones out of the way. Is there any chance of this being restored please?
creator: lordjohn

title: ICONA EXIT
content: Buongiorno, Dopo l'ultimo aggiornamento sono sparite in alto a destra le icone di exit e l'icona per il rimpicciolimento della finestra del programma, ma rimangono solo le 3 linee del menù Come riuscire ad inserire le icone in alto a destra? Grazie mille!
creator: commerciale29

title: Full stop being inserted when not required
content: After a recent Thunderbird update (I'm now on v115) it now appears to be inserting a full stop (or period in US terminology) automatically after some text if you happen to accidentally, or deliberately, tap the space bar twice, giving a double space. Is there any setting to turn this off? I find this most annoying and it seems to be something my phone does too, so I guess it's come from that, as people are getting lazy and instead of typing the full stop at the end of a sentence, they simply tap the space bar twice and it adds the full stop for them. However, I don't like it on my phone, and I don't want this action in Thunderbird. I want my text exactly as I type it, not how someone else things I want it. Yes, I'm old fashioned and want my English exactly as I was taught, not this latest 'text' speak short hand stuff. So is there a setting somewhere, where I can turn this feature off. Thank you.
creator: roy4matra

title: sharing messages
content: Hi! under Thunderbird and IMAP if I read a message and keep it, my wife with another PC (Windows, Thunderbird) will not see it. I have to transfer it to her own address. Any tip? Thanks

title: I have used TB for years but since a few days ago I can not send emails via my TB.
content:
I have used TB for years but since a few days ago I can not send emails via my TB. I get following error message : Afsendelse af meddelelsen mislykkedes. Der opstod en fejl under afsendelsen. Mailserveren svarede: Must issue a STARTTLS command first. Kontrollér om din mailadresse er rigtig i dine kontoindstillinger og prøv igen.

Hope you can help on this. Kim
creator: lippo1

title: Disabling Threading FOREVER. and related shortcuts
content:
Threading is something I, and indeed large numbers of Thunderbird users, do NOT want, ever.

Please provide an option to disable threading, across all folders, all acounts.

Even worse, the option to Ignore Thread, is simply a way to lose emails. To have a shortcut to hide a message, without even knowing, is crazy. Given how poor Windows control of focus is, and how easy it is to start typing but actually still be in the email listings, its inevitable that you will hit e.g. K or A or whatever, and cause bizarre effects or lose emails.

So I want to disable threading to avoid losing emails. I would also like to disable Archiving, and other functions, that are all simply ways to lose emails by accident.

Thanks.
creator: jez16

title: Automate configuration options deployment
content:
Hello I'm currently in need of configuring all of the clients with the Root CA certificate needed to use our new proxy server. I've seen that Thunderbird uses its own certificate repository, but there is yet a configuration option for reading Windows machine's own store, called security.enterprise_roots.enabled . This could be the best option since my users work on shared windows terminal servers. Is there a way to deploy this setting to all users? (I haven't found a GPO template for Thunderbird with this setting) I think I could create a logon script to copy a default user.js to every profile folder, but I don't know where the system could read the profiles path (multiple for most of the users).

thanks
creator: d.calzolato

title: Thunderbird work speed and marking msgs as read function degraded after major upgrade few weeks ago
content: Dear all, I am Thunderbird user for almost a few decades now. Since upgrade several weeks ago, my Thunderbird became slower, and, also started to work not as before. Now it is, after few minor updates up today, 115.5.0 (32-bit) version. The main issue, beside slower speed in showing messages, is it does not mark some messages as read when selected. When I scroll selecting unread messages to read/show them, some of them are marked read as before it did, but some of them stay unmarked in spite of multiple times selecting them and holding them selected. This happens regardless of setting “Automatically mark message as read” options Immediately on display, or After displaying for 1 second. In most cases it happens with last received unread message. Last time I remember such erratic behavior was decades ago. I tried to switch off and back on that option, then restarting program, but nothing changes in it’s behavior. Please advise. Thanks in advance, Zoran
creator: zoran.milojkovic

title: after downloading mails inbox of thunderbird does not synchronize with IMAP account
content:
Hi, I use Firefox since more than a decade and till aprox. 4 weeks it worked perfectly. Since then the following happens:

These are my settings

  • I have thunderbird on my local laptop
  • have outlook on my mobile phone
  • I use gmx-mail

I did not change anything reg. Settings on my mobile, in GMX or in thunderbird

I can download all my mails. In my local inbox on my computer, I delet mails. IN THE PAST: after deleting mails in my local inbox, they were also deleted in GMX and on my mobile SINCE aprox. 4 weeks: on my local laptop, mails are deleted (or moved to a local folder) - in GMX and on my mobile phone with outlook, the mails stay in the inbox.

It seems that the inbox is only synchronised with showing new mails from the server, but not with deleting or moving mails.

In this way it is impossible to organize myselfe since the inbox on my phone / in GMX is overflowing.

Thanks for your help, Oliver
creator: walkolli

title: Can't connect to e-mail account
content:
I am running Thunderbird 115.5.0 on a Win 7 Pro PC (yeah, I know). I recently retired and am trying to change from my work e-mail settings to my personal Gmail account. I have the incoming server set to pop3.gmail.com and the port to 995. Authentication is SSL/TLS and normal password. The outgoing server is set to smtp.gmail.com and authentication is No Authentication, with port 465. When I click on the Get Messages icon Thunderbird doesn't seem to do anything. Is there something else I need to do, or does one of the settings need changing?

Thanks!

David Ansley
creator: buckmode

title: delay in displaying graphics within emails
content:
I have observed this behavior for a number of releases - currently running 115.4.2 (32-bit). TB doesn't seem to download, or at least process, a graphic within an email until I actually open it. The display can take what seems like a while. I have a relatively fast (deskside) system, lots of memory/disc, GB ethernet, and would like all graphics to be processed when the email is first downloaded instead of waiting. I don't see any setting to change this. Any suggestions appreciated.

Mark

title: Thunderbird locks up when I try to insert image
content:
After years without problems, Thunderbird suddenly started locking up when I try to insert an image into a new message. There is no error alert; the message just completely locks so that I have to force task to end. Until a couple of weeks ago, I was able to insert files stored on my computer or copied from browser with no problem at all. [Not talking about a signature, just an image. Emojis work fine]

Am not aware of changing anything. Running Windows 11 Home version 23H2, if that helps anyone explain what's happening. Thunderbird version 115.5.0 (64-bit)

Haven't tried un/reinstalling TBird as want first to see if there's an easier solution (have several accounts).

title: Mozilla Thunderbird and Charter - "cannot connect to SMTP server"
content:
I have been using Thunderbird for a few years now to manage my charter domain email account. On October 9th, 2023 Thunderbird stopped updating with new emails and the application started throwing an error stating "Cannot connect to SMTP server".

I have spent countless hours on the phone with Charter who have been very helpful in tracing emails for my account (both outbound and inbound) using their web email application. However, when testing with Thunderbird - everything goes wrong again.

My current server configuration is as follows: Server Type: IMAP Mail Server Server Name: mobile.charter.net Port: 993 User Name: full_email_address@charter.net

Outgoing Server (SMTP) Configuration: Server Name: mobile.charter.net Port: 587 Connection Security: SSL/TLS Authentication: Normal Password Username: full_email_address@charter.net

As it stands, I can send emails from my Thunderbird account to my various Gmail accounts that I have created while trouble shooting. My inbox has not updated since October 9th, 2023 in Thunderbird, but there are active emails coming into my account when I check my Charter web email inbox.

In addition to that, I have disabled all AV rules around email services. When I try sending emails in Safe Mode (Windows 11), I cannot send emails.

I have tried the following links of similar questions below, nothing has resolved the issue: "Thunderbird is not working with Charter" - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1159943 "Cannot send email via Thunderbird" - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1242053 "Server timeout connection" - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1073157
creator: thirdclassemailacc

title: Stahování zpráv do "Místní složky"
content: Dobrý večer, mám dva poštovní účty. Na minulém PC mi šlo nastavit v Thunderbirdu stahování zpráv z obou účtů rovnou do "Místní složka", do "Doručená pošta". Po spuštění TB zmizely v levé části oba účty a zůstala tam jen Místní složky. Po instalaci stejné verze TB na nový PC ikona "Rozšířené" zmizela. title: Thunderbird layout - classic view - message pane portion is too small, message list area is too large
content: Thunderbird layout - how do i enlarge the classic view current message pane window? it's too short/compressed, and i can only drag it up a little, then it stops. In the prior TB versions, I only saw the last 3 or 4 messages in the upper message list portion of the classic view layout. Now I'm seeing almost 10 messages in my messages list. Meanwhile, the actual current message viewing pane is now horizontally compressed so that the ratio of message list to message view is closer to 40% message list, 60% actual message text plus the header info. I have tried click and drag the upper border of the current message being viewed, towards the top of the screen, but it stops, and still shows me 10 most recent messages in my list, which is really useless. I only need to see the last 3 or 4. The rest of the viewing pane should be more of the text area of the current message being viewed. Is there a "config editor" tweak to reduce the messages list to 3 or 4 messages, and increase the actual current message viewing area? Or some other fix for this?
